OpenFoam source code fetch url gets redirected because of sourceforge.

The link <https://sourceforge.net/projects/openfoam/files/v2006/OpenFOAM-v2006.tgz> will be led to

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/19409802/87025610-35ba8100-c20d-11ea-9e96-510d5ba30cce.png)

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack mirror create openfoam
```

### Error Message

<!-- If Spack reported an error, provide the error message. If it did not report an error but the output appears incorrect, provide the incorrect output. If there was no error message and no output but the result is incorrect, describe how it does not match what you expect. -->
```console
==> Adding package openfoam@2006 to mirror
==> openfoam: 2006
==> Fetching https://develop.openfoam.com/Development/openfoam/commit/8831dfc58b0295d0d301a78341dd6f4599073d45.patch
####################################################################################################################################################################################################### 100.0%
==> Already downloaded /tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-jwd648ct/8831dfc58b0295d0d301a78341dd6f4599073d45.patch
==> Already downloaded /tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-jwd648ct/8831dfc58b0295d0d301a78341dd6f4599073d45.patch
==> Warning: Error while fetching openfoam@2006
  sha256 checksum failed for /tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-jwd648ct/8831dfc58b0295d0d301a78341dd6f4599073d45.patch

```
